name: Ooga Booga
summary: Ooga Booga takes place on a set of mystical islands in the tropics. Named after the Volcano Goddess, the Ooga Booga Island rises from the sea once every full moon and during this time, four tribes compete in a series of games. You take control of the witch doctor of your tribe where competing in various strategic games will power up your Island magic (called Mojo) thus appeasing Ooga Booga and sparing your tribe from her volcano wrath. Online matches have several modes of play including Capture the Flag, King of the Hill, Tiki Wars, Domination, and Deathmatch.

name: Oozi: Earth Adventure
summary: Oozi: Earth Adventure is a classic 2D platformer with old school gameplay - no puzzles, no punishment, just 100% pure classic platforming fun! Its most prominent features are HD visuals and beautiful hand-drawn art, but despite its visual style, it’s a good fit for all kinds of gamers. The variety of difficulty levels – from Kid to Hardcore – allows everyone to enjoy the game regardless of their skill level. It tells the story of Oozi - an alien spaceship pilot who crashed on planet Earth, lost his space suit and needs to find his way home.

name: Oo-Topos
summary: After having crashlanded on the planet of Oo-Topos and taken prisoner your goal is to break out of captivity, repair your ship and get away from the hostile planet.

name: Ooblets
summary: Ooblets is a farming, creature collection, and town life game where you build up your farm, befriend townsfolk, grow ooblets, and have dance-offs.

name: Oodlescape - The Apocalypse
summary: Oodlescape - The Apocalypse is a unique Adventure-Escape experience for the HTC Vive which embraces being a videogame in a cube-filled world of wackiness. Randomized puzzle solutions ensures the game is a fresh challenge on each attempt. Burn and blast your way through the nuclear base in an escape against the clock!

name: Ookibloks
summary: Ookibloks combines the spirit of classic action puzzlers with a bright visual style and an ultra-catchy soundtrack. In this game you help Ooki the Monkey collect all his stolen bananas while avoiding enemies like crabs, ghosts, piranhas and the all-powerful Devil Cat.​

name: oO
summary: "oO" is a hardcore minimal arcade game.

name: Oozumou Tamashii
summary: Oozumou Tamashii is a Sports game, developed by Sun L and published by Takara, which was released in Japan in 1992.

name: Oolite
summary: Oolite is a space sim game, inspired by Elite, powered by Objective-C and OpenGL, and designed as a small game that is easy for users to pick up, modify and expand upon. Almost every aspect of the game can be changed by using simple, free graphics packages and text editors.

name: Oops! Prank Party
summary:
Victory is sweet, but losing is hilarious! 4 player action with 100 games!

Featuring one of the most robust avatar creators in a party game, you’ll be able to create your onscreen personality to play as throughout the game. Go for the perfect match, or create a completely zany character; the choice is yours! Unlock new accessories and costume options through playing to get even more creative.

Your Loss is Everyone’s Laugh

Putting a new spin on hilarity, Oops! Prank Party offers embarrassing costumes and pranks on the player that loses any given game. On screen actions have lasting effects on the character avatars that stay with them throughout the entire game. From throwing on a monkey costume to wearing cardboard pants; anything goes in this irreverent part of the game that will have players laughing out loud!

FEATURES

• Play through an incredibly fun mix of 100 games designed for multiplayer wackiness!
• From brain games to action packed platforming, Oops! Prank Party keeps players on their toes and in the action.
• Character creation tool enables players to customize their on screen avatar.
• Light-hearted and hilarious, Oops! Prank Party adds a humorous spin on losing by allowing the winner to choose which player gets embarrassed!

name: Ookujira - Giant Whale Rampage
summary:
Earth is under attack! Evil alien robots from outer space are invading the cities and human technology is inadequate to oppose the machine onslaught. 
 
Despite having been oppressed for ages by mankind, an ancient cetacean champion sets aside the disputes and rises from the depths to whack some robot butt!

name: Ookami-otoko Satsujin Jiken
summary: A murder mystery game apparently involving a werewolf.

name: Ooze: Creepy Nights
summary: Ooze - Creepy Nites is a satirical homage to horror games genre.

name: Ookiku Furikabutte: Honto no Ace ni Nareru Kamo
Ookami to Koushinryou: Umi wo Wataru Kaze
summary:
Get ready to step into the shoes of Kraft Lawrence as you strive to take Holo back to her hometown of Yoitsu.

Having secured a contract to collect some money from a town on the other shore, everything should be plain sailing ahead for the duo, but of course, the best laid plans of mice and wolves often go awry…

name: Oozengard R-Re-Rebooted
summary: 2D Open World Retro Goodness Adventure Game Packed into your Pocket. A stepping stone for 2D Games.

name: OOG: The Object Orientation Game
summary: This is a computer version of Tangram. Tangram is an ancient Chinese puzzle with just a few geometric shapes (to be exact, one square, one parallelogram and five triangles of varied sizes). Move and rotate these pieces to build a goal shape (squares, polygons, profiles,...). The program has dozens of pre-made goals, but you can create and save your own. If you are stuck, the program can help you by placing a piece of your choice in the correct position.

name: Ooze: Creepy Nites
summary: You have been left a house by your deceased uncle. Soon you learn that there is something evil and sinister afoot.

name: Ooh, Aah, & You: Fetch-a-Fruit
summary: Ooh and Aah's: Fetch-a-fruit is a game from 2005 originally published on the Playhouse Disney website. In the game you are supposed to draw a vine through fruits that are on the screen, while on the Easy difficulty you have to draw a vine through all the fruits that are on the screen, while on Medium, you only need to draw through 3 up to 5 fruits that are on the screen. The game has 5 rounds that between each other will change the monkey, if you started on Aah, the next will be Ooh and if you started with Ooh, the next is Aah

name: oOo: Ascension
summary: oOo: Ascension is a lightning-paced test of reflexes - can you navigate your way through these short but challenging courses? Put your skills to the test in this indie speedrunner, where unique puzzles and challenges constantly evolve to give a gameplay experience like no other

name: Oops!!! I Slept With Your Mom
summary: A small indie title in which you must avoid obstacles and fight against enemies in order to reunite a baby with its mommy. It 's a pretty simple endless game which starts fairly easy and gets harder as you progress through the levels. Be it for wasting a little time or score chasing, mommies are waiting for you!

name: OO.Inc
summary: OO.Inc is a indie 3-Match-puz game. You are a newbie employee. Complete tasks and unlock new levels. Put material chains on the board.make a line of 3 same color to score.dots can be stacked on circles.

name: Oops!!! Puzzles!!!
summary: We offer you a puzzle game. The meaning of the game – making a mosaic pattern that you want to add up from a variety of fragments of different shapes. The greatest interest in this game will cause thrill-seekers, as it contains scary pictures (horror).

name: Oopi's Quest
summary: Oopi has crash landed on an unknown planet. It's up to you to guide Oopie through the different areas collecting nuts to fix his ship.

name: Ookami to Koushinryou: Boku to Holo no Ichi-nen
summary: A spin-off of the main story, the game takes place in an alternative world and follows the adventures of the player as an original character loosely based on the series’ protagonist Kraft Lawrence. A novice merchant seeking to expand his business, he signs a contract for ownership of a horse-drawn cart, which comes with some very unusual conditions. Accordingly, the player is tasked with the job of delivering Holo, a girl with the ears and tail of a wolf, to her hometown whose location she has forgotten.

name: Ooer
summary: An exploration game. There are many items you can find.

name: OOTP Baseball Go!
summary: OOTP Go! is the mobile version of Out of the Park Baseball.

name: Ooze: The Escape
summary: An platformer for the ZX Spectrum. Play as the Ooze and try to escape from the laboratory that created you.

name: Oona the Druid's Path
summary: Join the young druid Oona in an adventure to complete her first task to become a full druid. Travel through thick forests and swamps, face the creatures inhabiting them, reach the Cloud Kingdom and fight against the evil Meiga in this beautiful 2.5D platformer game.

name: O---O
summary: You are the result of a project codenamed O---O, the alter-ego, the mechanical expression of a particle of your soul. You traverse the corridors of digital reality in order to destroy the enemy of the system. The main rule of the game is not to die. Each contact of the core with the object causes your annihilation, which means returning to the last checkpoint. The number of lives per location is limited.

name: Ookami Game
summary:
12 people are all gathered together inside of a mysterious building, who are then forced to play the "Wolf Game".

Each person must draw a card. One person draws the wolf card, and must kill another player. Everyone else draws a sheep card, and must find out who the wolf is in a trial. If the wolf is found out, they are then executed.

To escape from the building, the players must find every wolf - and in the process, discover the truth to this game.

name: Ooops! 2
summary: Stay busy juggling increasingly exciting and complex recipes in this fast & furious cooking game based on the colourful and successful feature film Ooops! 2 ! Slip into the role of Dave or Kate and provide the hungry mob on the ark with ever-changing tasty treats. The wonderful animals on the ark are hungry. As cook for the whole horde of beasts on the ark you’ve got your hands full stuffing all those jaws. Prepare fascinating dishes out of fabulous ingredients and unlock popular characters from the movie. Play as Dave, Finny, Hazel, Leah, or even as Chief Clyde and Patch. Stay busy juggling increasingly exciting and complex recipes and master the widely varied levels. There are many variations of backdrop settings from the movie and numerous original film sequences straight out of the cinema! Ooops! 2 is fabulous game fun for the whole family!

name: Oozing Islands
summary: Enjoy freedom of movement in full 3D with no fixed paths in this tower defense and RTS hybrid. Your units are your towers and you can build fences anywhere. Set your units' behavior to create a perfect team of defenders. Two leader boards let you play forever!

name: Ooe
summary: Ooe is the latest period psychological horror mystery from ADELTA, developers of Hashihime of the Old Book Town and UUUltraC. A classic closed-circle mystery set on a remote island in 1950s Japan—revel in the intrigue and perverse pleasure of being deceived by the people you trust the most!

name: Oozora Hectare Nouen
summary:
あこがれの農園ライフシミュレーション！
広大な敷地に人気の観光農園をプロデュースしよう。
シャキシャキレタスや甘いイチゴを愛情たっぷり育ててブランド野菜を生みだせば
近隣のお店から出荷依頼が殺到！コンテストにも優勝しちゃうかも！
キャンプ場やアスレチック場などの観光施設を建ててツアー客を呼び込むと収入がぐんと増える。
かわいい動物たちが名産品を生み出し、農園をサポートしてくれるぞ。
さあ、たくさんの観光客が訪れる、自然豊かな大農園めざして頑張りましょう!!

name: Oops! No Brakes
summary: Now with more levels! More cars! And even fewer brakes! Oops!

name: Ooo
summary: shooot sooome aliens!!!

name: O o o
summary: Air hockey but you control both players. Keep the puck from touching bad stuff to rack up points!

name: Ooze Redux
summary: A NES hard game, made to run and play on original hardware. Ported to the PC. 7 hard and unique levels. An original gripping ChipTune sound track! 8 bit glory in this side scrolling shooter platformer!

name: Oogy: Can You Help
summary: Play as a business card-wielding sheep in this mysterious indie narrative deckbuilder. Explore a character-rich map, collect new mechanics, uncover dark mysteries, and make new friends. Oh—plus secrets, bosses, and all original music with a hand-drawn art style!

name: Oozescape
summary: Oozescape is a challenging 2D platformer where you play as Ooze, a slime creature formed in the depths of a mysterious factory. You guide this newborn life-form through 50 versatile levels while avoiding all the different dangers. The levels have colorful and atmospheric lighting that helps lead Ooze through this strange world. You can further challenge to yourself by trying to achieve the best possible times in all the levels or take your time to get all the collectibles.

name: Ookami Kakushi
summary: Ookami Kakushi is a horror visual novel developed by guyzware, Konami and Ryukishi07.

name: Oops You Started An Intergalactic War
summary: A "Playdate" game about intergalactic etiquette

name: Ookami Game Another
summary: An alternate telling of the original Wolf Game story. This version introduces three new participants on top of all of the original participants and different murderers/story.

name: (O_O)
summary: (O_O) is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame created by Kontena in RPG Maker 2000. You take the role of Suzutsuki, as she explores her dream worlds. Along the way, you can collect effects that alter her emotions.

name: OOTP Baseball Go 23
summary: Take the beloved Out of the Park Baseball series with you wherever you go. The Infinite Baseball Sandbox is now in your hands wherever you are in the world! Manage teams, control any franchise throughout MLB History, build and draft your Perfect Team, and so much more! Play what the pros play!

name: Oops! All Keys
summary:
Keys, keys everywhere.
In this hack you need to know how to use a key.
You will need frame perfect keyjumps, clips and lots of knowledge about this game to be able to beat it.

name: Ookami-kun
summary: Jump action game by Wanpaku Pixels.

name: Ookami-kun to Kabocha-kun
summary: This is a game of Onigokko by Wanpaku Pixels.

name: Ookami-kun 3
summary: The wolf is the main character in this game by Wanpaku Pixels.

name: Ookami-kun 4
summary: The wolf is the main character in this game by Wanpaku Pixels.

name: Ookami-kun 5
summary: The wolf is the main character in this game by Wanpaku Pixels.

name: Ooglians
summary: Ooglians are coming! Nothing excites an ooglian more than smashing machinery. Protect your machinery with more machinery which attracts even more ooglians. How unfortunate.

name: Ookeenga
summary:
The gameplay of Ookeenga is a combination of 3 genres that are common in the gaming community: Real-time Strategy, Collectible Card, and Tower Defense.
Players will be placed with troops/active skills to attack the opponent on a battlefield.
The match ends when: The player destroys the opponent's main house.
Within 3 minutes, the match will automatically terminate the game and calculate the score based on the % remaining health of the Main-tower and Sub-towers. Whoever destroys the opponent's Main Tower shall immediately win the game. If time's up and the Main Tower still remains, which side destroys more towers will become the winner.

name: Ooh and Aah's Coconutty Bowling
summary: Ooh and Aah's Coconutty Bowling is a bowling game of the two mascots of the old Playhouse Disney Channel, the game consists in 3 rounds of bowling with Ooh and Aah, the goal is to make the highest amount of points possible

name: O-o-o
summary:
The essential turning point strategy game!
Keep the board moving as you rotate discs to chain colors, connect corners and rack up high scores. Keep a level head under pressure as you clear as many lines as possible.
Earn perks to improve your chances, including Rewind giving you a second shot, Rainbow to chain with any color, and Bombs to clear out the board.
Combine perks and discover new tactics - drop a Rainbow and Rewind for better placement, or Rewind drop a Bomb? The choice is yours.
Thoughtfully designed with minimalist aesthetics and a rich ambient soundtrack, unwind while keeping your brain and body sharp.

name: Oops, I said Yes?!
summary:
I lived a fun and trendy life as a working woman, but after a night of drinking, I found myself married to a coworker!?

A welcome home kiss, a ring on my finger... I shouldn't feel love for a contract marriage, but why does my heart beat so fast?

An oath and a marriage registration later, can love be born from marriage?

name: Ooze
summary: Ooze is the fifth game of NES version of Action 52.

name: Ooze
summary:
Ooze is the 4th game of Action 52 (Genesis). It is also a major improvement over the NES version of the game.

You have to fight enemies with a gun you have, and need to stay on the floating moveable platforms and try to get keys, and if you do it right, you go to next level. Also if you land on something very low of where you were, you die.

name: Ookouchi Gengorou Ikka
summary: Ookouchi Gengorou Ikka is a cancelled simulation game for the Nintendo 64. The game was not ever officially announced and it's existence is only known through a prototype build that was shown off by Game Tanteidan, a retro game store based in Nihonbashi, Osaka, on their blog.

name: Oodee's Passion
summary: Oodee's Passion is a coop crafting game set in North America during the last ice age. Oodee and his faithful spirit companion Doog have been ostracized from their tribe and find themselves in a strange land where nothing is at it seems. Players must explore, craft and solve puzzles in order to help Oodee & Doog earn their way back into the hearts of their tribe.

name: Oome
summary: "In oOme, control time with your mouse, make the celestial bodies dance, feed your black hole, but avoid contact. A relaxing and hypnotic arcade game."

name: Oom
summary: Oom is a rhythmic dungeon crawler where player simultaneously moves and shoots on the beat and controls the direction of the character with the crank. It's an unusual take on a rhythm game where decisive action is made in-between the beats.

name: Oops! All Techbase
summary: A 32-Level Megawad, each level Techbase themed.

name: Ooze Odyssey
summary: Ooze your way through dank dungeons and dissolve thousands of monsters in this top-down shoot’em up roguelite. Slay enough and gather their essence to earn new cards from the Witch’s deck. Defeat powerful foes and explore deep places to earn more cards for your deck!

name: Oops! All Greyboxes!
summary: Oops! All Greyboxes! is a fun and quirky community project where we made maps using only prototyping textures. This was meant to help us focus on gameplay and combat encounters using limited resources, while still making maps that looked cool.

name: Oops, All Archers!
summary: Oops, All Archers! is a romhack of Fire Emblem 8 that makes every unit an archer and bowlocks everyone while keeping the enemies unchanged.

name: Ooze: The Great and Powerful
summary: Ooze: The Great and Powerful - is a puzzle platformer without the ability to jump. In this adventure, you will learn the story of classic monsters who are trying to get along with each other by playing for the Ooze Cube guarding the dungeon.

name: Ooparts
summary: Previously unreleased brick smasher,

name: Oozing Blasphemy
summary: Large challenging dark industrial runic map with 16 secrets and custom sounds, built for Arcane Dimensions 1.81

name: Ooga
summary: Help Ooga to retrieve his stolen food stockpile in this fast-paced, spear-based parkour platformer. Play the first world and a half in the free demo, secrets included!

name: Oookuki
summary:
The chronicles of the Oooku, the women's quarters of Edo Castle, is remembered infamously in Japan as a classic kusoge, slang for a very bad video game.

The story revolves around discourse between some of the women in the Oooku over the current shogun, which eventually leads to the player needing to endlessly search around a huge amount of empty rooms and withstand annoying load times as you interview people for their testimonies. There's spelling errors throughout the entire game, as well as typographical errors that have the Edo era characters speaking very modern at unexpected times. The graphics were criticized as especially ugly in 2008 when the PS3 was gaining popularity, and the narrative is hard to follow as the text moves automatically with no text log. Everything is timed, and knowing what to do next is very difficult without a guide.

After gathering all your information throughout the year, you have a trial, which can result in different endings.

name: OoT3D Randomizer
summary: A randomizer mod for The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time 3D.

name: Ooka Ooka Adventure
summary: Ooka Ooka Adventure is an adorable 2 player co-op puzzle platformer! Join the Ookas, Ooka Bing and Ooka Ping, on their journey as they gather the Great Bananas! Take control of Ooka Ping or Ooka Bing, either using gamepads, or with the mouse and keyboard!

name: Oops! All Gyarus!
summary:
One year after opening Barlow's Books and Bistro, the gang decide to celebrate with a custom concoction of tea and sparkly, glamorous liqueur. Surely, nothing could possibly go wrong. In fact, with Maggie and Portia finally existing in the same timeline, how could things go any way other than totes fab?

The fans have spoken, and we've heard you loud and clear: Mice Tea simply did not contain enough gyarus. This very special April Fools scenario aims to correct that mistake. Jam packed with as much gyaru goodness as we could muster, with guest illustrations from Popcore, blackshirtboy, NotZachForWork, CupcakeCarly, ComicTF, Ayvie, and Cavitees, and guest audio by Raina the Mouse, there's a lot to enjoy.

name: Oops! Zombie Swarm
summary: An unknown virus has turned most people into zombies. In this disaster, you unexpectedly discover a mysterious dragon egg, which seems to grant you immunity to the virus. Now, your mission is to protect this precious dragon egg and ensure it is not destroyed by hordes of zombies.

name: Ooooo
summary: A 82 exit level hack for Super Mario World by JUMP Team and Kevin centered around green bean-based gimmicks and challenges.

name: Ooga Booga: Troubles in Time
summary: Get ready for an exciting adventure in "Ooga Booga: Troubles in Time"! Choose your character and travel through different universes to defeat the forces of evil, the enemy is waiting to beat you up! Try the best controls for platform games. Jump over obstacles to pass the level. Fight against a multitude of enemies in different scenarios. Escape from the rolling stone down the hill. Ride the pig and dodge the thugs. Talk to the characters to defeat the final boss. BEWARE, the enemy wants to trick you, don't fall into his traps. Prove that you are the chosen one!

name: Oopz-Oofs
summary: A quirky, playful dog sim where you body-swap with a dog. Waking up from a sweet dream, John finds himself in his dog's body! Sniff, bark, beg, and use paw to interact with the townfolks. Can John find a way to return to his human form, or will this unexpected adventure change them forever?

name: Ooze Keeper
summary: Ooze Keeper is a tactical roguelike that combines monster collecting and resource management. You'll harness the unique abilities of various slimes, construct efficient structures, and optimize resources to grow your farm and earn money with each turn.

name: Ooze Less
summary:
A visceral interactive fiction game about being an ooze-creature in a human world and all the themes of feeling like an outside that creates.

"a lump in my throat that i had to get out with no heart and no head and no hope and no mouth"

name: Ooga Booga Battle
summary: Raise your Ooga Booga Baby for greatness in Ooga Booga Battle, a half virtual pet, half horde defense arcade experience! Train to evolve into a fierce cryptid and take down as many Ooga Booga Baddies as you can! Can you battle with the Ooga Booga Best of 'em?!

name: Ooohh, Big Stretch!!!
summary:
Ooohh, Big Stretch!!! is a block-pushing puzzle game with a few extra twists!

Start your morning stretch (and never stop) as you collect treats and toys, growing ever longer and spreading through more and more of the house.

Watch out for messes! If you don’t clean up, you’ll spread them everywhere!

Sticky-tricky puzzles stand between you and everything you need for your trip to the park.

Stretch your way to walkies!

name: Ookami Okami
summary: You're dead. But your love life is just beginning! Reborn in the Spirit Realm, take over a crumbling hot spring inn and partner with a brooding masked god who hides more than his face. Explore secrets, rebuild the inn, and flirt through simmering tension in this point-and-click romance visual novel.

name: Oolo
summary: OOLO is a modern take on the classic isometric adventure. Embark on a non-linear journey across mysterious forests, haunted catacombs, and magical factories. Solve puzzles to collect keys and discover upgrades that change the way you explore this lush fantasy world.

name: OopsFixers Company
summary: OopsFixers Company is a cooperative action game for up to 4 players where you work in a team to fix extreme situations that other companies avoid. Control unique characters. Collaborate with your teammates. Improve your team to be ready for the impossible.

name: OOTP Baseball 26 Go!
summary: Take the beloved Out of the Park Baseball series with you wherever you go. The award-winning baseball simulation game is now in your hands wherever you are in the world!

name: Ooble Gardens
summary: Ooble Gardens is a cozy game where you, an Ooble gardener care for little Oobles, shaping their dream fairy garden. Merge and combine their offerings to discover a variety of cozy furniture for you to decorate the garden with!

name: Ooedo Huusui Ingaritsu: Hanabi 2
summary:
Ooedo Huusui Ingaritsu Hanabi 2 is a board game that takes place in the Edo period and allows up to 4 players to play in the board game at the same time. The game features different game mode.

The story mode is about that in a town one day a Oni appears and the town's people decide that they will need someone that can control that demon, and they decide to make a tournament to decide which of the 4 possible candidates will be the chosen one.

The gameplay is the typical in a board game since there are square and the player will advance more or less in each turn depending of the number that he gets. During the gameplay the demons will attack and the town will be more destroyed.
